lender.name: Ulf
lender.loan_because: I am interested in the lenders development
lender.occupational_info: writing about the reality that beats hope

lender.name: Tamara
lender.loan_because: There are too many people suffering in this world and I want to help those in need.

lender.name: AaronB
lender.loan_because: I recognize that there is not a level playing field in the world and that I was born into a more advantageous position than many. It is a small way for me to help give someone else an opportunity that they might not otherwise have.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: ... because I care.
lender.occupational_info: I help people and small companies with legal troubles, in the areas of the Internet, Intellectual Property (copyright, trademark, patents), and free speech.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: When I showed me Kiva I was so eager to create an account so my dad and I quickly created a Kiva account. Once we were done creating a Kiva account I quickly started loaning people money. Now I check my account about every week to see if anyvody paid back so that I can loan more people money. GO KIVA!
lender.occupational_info: Well I mostly loan to people who are just starting so that they can have a fresh start. I also like to loan to people who are just about done. (for more information on my lending ways you can always send me a message) BYE!!!

lender.name: Elizabeth and Billy
lender.loan_because: We like the opportunity to give someone a chance to succeed and hopefully improve their communities.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: To participate in a small way to help people who want a better life for themselves, their families and their neighbors. We all need a little help sometime in life. An opportunity to be a better global neighbor
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that provides medical equipment primarily for the elderly, My job is to work with caregivers to see that patients get the proper equipment for their needs.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I was lucky to have someone to help me start my own company. I want to do the same for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I own a marketing company. We design brochures and advertisements, and we produce large live events.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: everybody deserves a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info:
The individuals requesting loans through Kiva are the personification of the entrepreneurial spirit that has made the United States the greatest nation in the world.
I am glad to play a small role in helping others to achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.whereabouts: Tai Kok Tsui Kowloon Hong Kong
lender.loan_because: through Kiva I am experiencing just how interconnected we are and how small the world really is.
lender.occupational_info: I am an English teacher at a vocational college (post secondary school). I think that my students teach me, their teacher, more than I do them.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I want people to have a chance to help in their own community and succeed without paying too high a price.
lender.occupational_info: I travel and meet many people like the people Kiva are helping, I enjoy my work and want to help others to enjoy their's.

lender.name: Vivek & Bhavana
lender.loan_because: Capialism - The richest get loans at very low interest rates as their credit history is good and credit risk is very low. The poor on the other hand are the not eligible for loans, or are charged very high interest rates. This vicious cycle needs to be broken, and the more fortunate should break the system and let the less fortunate come out of the poverty trap. We should just think about the impact that our loans can have on each of the families that we try and support.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently working with a hedge fund as an analyst, mainly looking at asian equities.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the opportunity to shape their own life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student, currently studying Arabic and international studies.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I meet people from many 3rd world countries at my job, they are very hard working brothers that just need a chance. I feel that sharing what you have can only help you.
lender.occupational_info: NYC taxi garage--- work with many people from the same countries as people getting loans on this site. I like to think that I could be helping a friend/relative of someone who works with me.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: Sharing with others is a human need. It keeps us grounded with our neighbors around the world, and, hopefully, will leave the world a better place than we found it.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: Jesus calls us as imitators of Christ to aid the tired, weary, weak, and poor. I give because He gave first.
lender.occupational_info: I develop computer software that companies use to streamline business and save money.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I have been privileged enough to be going to the best school in the country and I have so many opportunities that others don't have, I would rather forgo a daily cup of coffee and help others.
lender.occupational_info: I study Africa and volunteer around the world when I can.

lender.name: sarah
lender.loan_because: I have to start a project called Sahakaar for the 50 slum women to empower them through income generation activities and micro credits. This project will be self-supportive and after the repayment of Loan the profit will be used to start more Sahakaar groups. Instead of I waiting for funds I would prefer to take loan and repay.
lender.occupational_info: Sahakaar group is a group of 10 women working together taking micro credits and manufacture different products. These women are also provided education every day 1 hour after their work.

lender.name: Donna & Sandy
lender.loan_because: We believe that it is the right thing to do - to help out others in need. It is such a small thing that can make such a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: We live in a small town in Southern Saskatchewan, Canada. We have a moderate sized grain farm. Our family consists of 3 boys, 1 girl and 2 cats.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: i know this website from the tv, and it's really really useful that can help lots of people over the world.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Because it’s the least i can do

lender.name: Larry & Cathy
lender.loan_because: We are both self-employed and understand the challenges and benefits of starting and maintaining a small enterprise

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: To help others to be able to care for their families by making a living. Making the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I provide office support to others while caring for my 4 children (ages 11, 7, 5 and 20 months)

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: Anything that could help a family to live with dignity is worth helping.
lender.occupational_info: It is a combination of system support, troubleshooting, logistics and planning. It is an overwhelming job actually.

lender.name: Faruk
lender.loan_because: Help children for education. Three most important things are essential to win against poverty - 1. Education 2. Education and 3. Education
lender.occupational_info: IT Specialist

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to give a helping hand.

lender.name: Deepak
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to raise a loan for such a high interest rate. It make me feel good to help who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: Electrical Items distributor like Switchgear,Control gear products used in Electrical panels

lender.name: David John
lender.loan_because: I believe that the entrepreneurial spirit within a country with economic freedom can raise the world's standard of living.
lender.occupational_info: Comprehensive wealth management is based on the principle that small changes can have large effects over time.

lender.name: kagoda
lender.occupation: STUDENT WHO HAS TWO YEARS TO COMPLETE COURSE

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I want to support the entrepreneurial spirit and help those who are willing to work hard and take risks.
lender.occupational_info: I helped men and women think through the process of starting and growing their own small business, how to plan, market, finance, maintain records, etc.

lender.name: Kellie
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do. Helping someone to enhance there life is the best gift of all.

lender.name: Moïra
lender.loan_because: I admire people who are able to run their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English and French in a high school.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: To enable people to work and feed themselves
lender.occupational_info: Turning angry customers into happier ones

lender.name: Leann
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of my help making it possible for someone to create something positive and change their lives, and their communities. Although I live in the over-privileged America, I recognize money is NOT what makes the world go 'round. It's people and their dreams, and I like knowing I can help make a difference and do something important.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to change the world for the betterment of all mankind.
lender.occupational_info: I am a film director.

lender.name: Sondra and Nathan
lender.loan_because: I understand that some people just need a little help to get things going. It's nice to be able to reach out to those motivated people who are trying to make their lives better.

lender.name: Henrik Melander
lender.loan_because: I would like to help foreign entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: Works with computers to design and create telecom software.

lender.name: AMANDA
lender.occupation: Member Services Representative for Credit Union

lender.name: Kwali Media and Associates
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do, whilst keeping others in mind, that have less. We are lucky people
lender.occupational_info: Kwali Media and Associates record audio for film and television. We edit and produce music for media use.

lender.name: Kari
lender.loan_because: I want my 2 sons to learn the importance of small family businesses, and how they are the cornerstones of all communities around the world. We hope that our contributions are welcomed and smartly invested.
lender.occupational_info: Business consultant for overseas companies requiring sales and marketing related help in North-America.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can make a difference.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: Helping these people to earn a living and connecting with other people in the world is a better return than I can get anywhere else.

lender.name: Encounter Service Camp
lender.loan_because: Encounter the Gospel of Life is a youth service camp that desires to reach out and connect with our global community. We work with high school youth from the Washington DC, Baltimore, Boston, New York and Pennsylvania areas and strive to work with them and show them how they can also connect with people around the world through micro loans.
lender.occupational_info:
EGL is a Catholic Service Camp.
To learn more about us, visit our website or follow us on facebook (Encounter Service Camp):
www.eglweb.org

lender.name: Eldo
lender.loan_because: I believe we must all help each other. I came to this country as an immigrant and with hard work and the help of many loving people, I learned the language and became a successful businessman.
lender.occupational_info: I work part time as I am retired and I love to cook and spend time with friends and Italian cultural organizations. I especially love being with my family.

lender.name: Nicky & Ramon
lender.loan_because: We loan because the Kiva Project makes sense. We don't have much money but are willing to share with people who have less.
lender.occupational_info: Nicky produces and edits video programs. I'm a retired, disabled cartoonist -- can't draw anymore, so I write Micro fiction (under 500 words) stories.

lender.name: Lee and Sharon
lender.loan_because: Because we can and should!!

lender.name: P & S
lender.loan_because: it is a no brainer.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I want to help people!
lender.occupational_info: Music and movements

lender.name: Troutsfarm
lender.loan_because: We can.

lender.name: Shellie
lender.loan_because: * It feels good * I'm grateful to have the opportunity to share * It's easy (thanks Kiva!)
lender.occupational_info: I love to travel and meet new people. Travel is the best way to remember that 'we are all one', and we all ultimately want the same things: food, water, shelter, love, joy.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I like being able to help others become self-sufficient, and in turn help their families and communities.

lender.name: Brooks
lender.loan_because: i know i can make a difference and have been given so much.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I'm a single mom with a good job and I think it's important to help other moms.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Geotechnical Consulting firm in No. California.

lender.name: Camille
lender.loan_because: all the cool kids are doing it.
lender.occupational_info: I send marketing emails about skin products.

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: To offset an unjust and unequal system which benefits from keeping people impoverished, I am happy to contribute to the growth and financial maturing of the developing world. It is a way to equalize and reform capitalism without dismantling it, which I believe is the best approach to helping people build wealth. It’s a subversive and direct yet delicate approach to creating a world where opportunity is not reserved for those born into it.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am 6th grade student who plays soccer.

lender.name: Eulalia
lender.loan_because: We have so much here in the U.S. - everyone ought to realize how lucky they are and give to someone who's less fortunate and trying to improve their lives!
lender.occupational_info: I write website content, brochures, and marketing materials for small to medium sized businesses.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: I live in the world, not just my small space. And I have a responsibility to help where I am able.
lender.occupational_info: I mostly grow vegetables from seeds I get from Italy. I do it because its different and challenges my ability.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of being able to lend money that doesn't just feed a person or family for a day but sets them up for a lifetime of supporting themselves.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: a small gesture repeated by many people can make a huge difference where it's really needed.

lender.name: carlos
lender.occupational_info: ingeniero ambiental.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Helping eachother is the right thing to do. I hope my kids will learn it's not what you have but what you give.
lender.occupational_info: I am an internet entreprenuer. I buy at yard sales and sell my finds on the internet.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: There are many who have the drive to be successful and self-sufficient but they just need a helping hand at the start.

lender.name: Lily
lender.loan_because: it's a way for a young person to do something helpful in the world.

lender.name: ocean lover
lender.loan_because: This is something that I can do in MY income bracket!
lender.occupational_info: Venture Capital

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I believe people can improve their lives by self-direction, not by just doing what someone else tells them to do. Kiva seems to make that possible.
lender.occupational_info: As a lawyer, I help people and businesses to succeed; as a musician, I bring joy through music into my life and the lives of others

lender.name: John and Shannon
lender.occupational_info: We are retired now, but John was a businessman, and Shannon was a teacher. Shannon still teaches a college writing course occasionally.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate. God has blessed me so much in my own life.
lender.occupational_info: My company makes blogs - personal websites that can be easily updated. This allows people to share their stories and views with others and connect to people. I supervise the members of our team providing technical support to people with blogs.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: it is within my means.
lender.occupational_info: I write software to keep machines functioning.

lender.name: K L FABBI
lender.loan_because: It is my desire to help people get that chance to make a better life.
lender.occupational_info:
I am mostly retired, although I do some maintenance and investment.
I spend alot of time doing Ministry as a Christian. I enjoy doing workshops and teaching on Inner Healing Prayer, Gifts of the Holy Spirit and helping people open to God's Love.

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: We have tremendous power to make a positive difference and we ought to use it. I have so much respect for the effort these people put in everyday to support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school English teacher.

lender.name: Elyse
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am production manager, purchasing manager, and shipping manager for a small company that makes electronic testing equipment.

lender.name: Jamieson-Lee
lender.loan_because: It sounds like a great opportunity to help others in developing nations.

lender.name: Dani
lender.loan_because: I was born in Bulgaria and was adopted by my American family and I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student.

lender.name: ileana
lender.loan_because: In memory of Eric Tang. AllPeopeBeHappy

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: As a professional woman and business owner, I want to help other women around the world achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Nathan and Erika
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I advise institutional clients how best to invest their monies. Erika is getting her PhD.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: .....I can.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. I want to help.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: I believe that God blesses people so that they can pass those blessings on to others. I have certainly received my share of them throughout my life, and I believe that understanding this principle is the key to happiness and gratitude in life.
lender.occupational_info: I am training to be a counseling psychologist, which is a person who spends time listening and talking with others about difficulties in their lives, and attempts to encourage them about the present and the future

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: Although currently researching and writing, I am also known for teaching American government and U. S. Environmental Politics and Policy at Colorado State University.

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: I know how it feels to need help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Sr Citizen and no longer work except doing crafts and photography.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I love supporting business owners and creating new opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Our mission is to have every family in the US be under the care of a holistic practitioner (healer.) We help holistic practitioners become successful at business so they can help more people.

lender.name: Elisa Kang
lender.loan_because: the greatest good for another is not just to share your riches, but to reveal to him his own.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I would like to see the end of world poverty in my lifetime. I hope by donating I can make an impact.
lender.occupational_info: I support computer business systems.

lender.name: ping
lender.loan_because: everyone should be given an equal shot at a good living... And because Kiva does great work.
lender.occupational_info: Business development for a global music-based entertainment company.

lender.name: PEHF
lender.loan_because: We loan to make lives better.
lender.occupational_info: We try to live ethically and without superstition.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.occupational_info: I work for the advertising side of a magazine creating promotional ads, invitations to events and collateral for those events.

lender.name: Merrilee & Daniel
lender.loan_because: we can and it is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: sitting in offices, working on computers, talking with people on the phone, providing our piece of the puzzle.

lender.name: Randall & Sharon
lender.loan_because: I want too. It gives me a good feeling to help those less fortunate.

lender.name: Giselle
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life and would like to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a bilingual high school counselor, which means I work with Latino students grades 9th - 12th.

lender.name: Dimitar
lender.loan_because: i love doing good to others!

lender.name: Cindi
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life and feel a responsibility to give back and give people a "leg" up in their quest to be support their families.

lender.name: TWUM
lender.occupation: SECONDHAND CLOTHES SELLER /PRESIDENT OF NGO IYPC
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO WORK HARD TO HELP ORPHANS AND THE POOR.
lender.occupational_info: SELLING SECONDHAND CLOTHES IS GOOD IN AFRICAN MARKET BE- CAUSE A LOT OF PEOPLE CANN'T AFFORD TO PAY NEW CLOTHES.

lender.name: BYU-Idaho
lender.loan_because: Where much is given, much is expected.
lender.occupational_info: We educate youth to participate and lead throughout the world.

lender.name: Roland Hamlin
lender.loan_because: I find Kiva a wonderful way to make the world a better place to live in. I love to read the stories of success, and I strongly beleive in the power of small loans to poor people to give them help to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I support local development projects in rural Sweden with advice and fundraising. I also work as a freelance journalist.

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: We have hope.

lender.name: Mirko
lender.loan_because: I want others to have a chance at some of the same opportunities I have received. I want to give out of what's been given to me.
lender.occupational_info: I purchase housing developments that are run down and improve them for low income people.

lender.name: Jeanette
lender.loan_because: It is the most viable way to help individuals and at the same time respect their personal dignity.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people lift themselves out of poverty by promoting entrepreneurship via small loans.

lender.name: C Weber
lender.loan_because: We want to support people in their efforts to find a better life and contribute to their communities. Micro loans provide us a wonderful opportunity to do this!
lender.occupational_info: Women owned business providing training and other products to help improve quality of products and services in businesses worldwide.

lender.name: Jonah
lender.loan_because: I want to live in a world where every person has a chance to succeed and be happy . Like Me!
lender.occupational_info: I am a peaceful warrior who strives to encouge goodwill, tolerance and harmony.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who don't ask for charity, but ask for a chance to make their lives, their familes lives and their countries better through their own hard work.

lender.name: Christie
lender.loan_because: I can help others who are motivated to find and seize an opportunity to change their lives for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses find ways to solve problems to perform better. A trip to South Africa sparked my interest in making a difference to help South Africans be offered an opportunity to enter into the formal sector of this emerging economy.

lender.name: Céline
lender.loan_because: A mon avis, très bon outil pour apporter plus d'équité dans notre beau monde....bien contente d'avoir ce moyen de partage....
lender.occupational_info: J'ai travaillé comme infirmière Principalement Auprès des Enfants .

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: People have helped me, I can now help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a university library. My job is to manage the department that buys and prepares the books to go on the shelves. My husband and I have two sons ages 11 and 13.

lender.name: Helene
lender.loan_because: I'm glad to have the opportunity of helping enterprising people in a direct way.

lender.name: Dan and Laura
lender.loan_because: I love the entrepreneurial spirit and believe that everyone should have a chance to get ahead.

lender.name: Jenn
lender.loan_because: I wanted to loan because I feel that it is important to give a hand up and not a hand out but also because of the lucky chance of geography I was born in Canada. I believe that it is our responsibility to help people who are less fortunate but are also trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a university student studying nutrition. I also work at an optometrist office as a vision specialist.

lender.name: Sharon & Don
lender.loan_because: we need to make a difference. We support entrepreneur attitude and this helps those with drive but not the means.
lender.occupational_info: We own a wine business in downtown Chicago.

lender.name: Valérie
lender.loan_because: It is a really simple and smart way to encourage people's personnal initiatives to make their way out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a northern communitie fro the local social services. That involves dealing with pretty much anyone from the communitie who request support or assistance towards challenges their facing.

lender.name: Aamir
lender.loan_because: I like to see people empowered to live their lives freely.
lender.occupational_info: I design refinery units that process oil.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I'm excited about the opportunity to help someone else grow their business and obtain success for themselves, their family and their community. This is the most sustainable way of making such contributions that I've seen.
lender.occupational_info: Continuous business improvement.

lender.name: Basiru
lender.occupational_info: Please can your help me? I need financial assistance do an Australia Skill Assessment Test in Australia. If you need more information please mail me back.

lender.name: Marsha
lender.loan_because: It's the most thrilling thing ever, for me to be able to be able to provide a little assistance to someone who lives across the earth from where I live, and know that it will help make a difference in their prosperity and happiness.

lender.name: Jonas
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: Adapting computer systems for humans (instead of forcing humans to adapt to computer systems).

lender.name: Bryant
lender.loan_because: I have plenty, it would be wrong to not help others.
lender.occupational_info: Much homework.

lender.name: Steffi
lender.occupational_info: I love to design anything...

lender.name: Karlos
lender.loan_because: as someone who has been helped growing up, mostly with educational expenses, it is the least I can do to help empower individuals who want to be productive citizens.

lender.name: arthur
lender.loan_because: I like to see other peoples dreams come true. By working hard and willing to reach out for help.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: It's a little thing for me and a big thing for the people I help, and I have so much.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I like helping others feel secure about their future.
lender.occupational_info: An Everyday Philanthropist!

lender.name: Sergey
lender.loan_because: i don't see a reason not to

lender.name: Morrie
lender.loan_because: My aunt gave me a gift certificate to Kiva for my 8th grade graduation. It feels good to actually help others by giving the money directly instead of just giving money to charity. I will also be able to use the money I get back to help another business and keep lending.
lender.occupational_info: I do not have a job other than to go to school and do chores.

lender.name: Josie
lender.loan_because: I feel like I need to give to the world because I have enough in my life. I think you should lend because some people live there life the easy way and think nothings bad but there are horrible things going on.
lender.occupational_info: I save the day. And I love my parents at the same time. I am twelve(12) years old. I scrubbed toilets to get this money for Kiva!!!!! P.S. that picture is of me on Halloween a year ago

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed, and would like to pass that along.
lender.occupational_info: I work to make sure my employer (My local hospital's) computers are secure and accurate.

lender.name: Karen & Freddy
lender.loan_because: We want to help someone else have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Karen helps people fill out government forms to pay their taxes. Freddy delivers mail for the Post Office.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: it supports sustainable development, women's rights, education, and democracy. Small loans make a big difference.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for all the opportunities I've had, and I want others to have opportunities also.
lender.occupational_info: I teach University and College level courses in Philosophy and Humanities. I am also finishing my PhD in Philosophy.

lender.name: Shaun
lender.loan_because: I enjoy seeing people reach their goals.
lender.occupational_info: Investment property, officer

lender.name: Cindee
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Manufacturer of Christian related gifts that are sold to retail stores in the United States and abroad.

lender.name: Gillie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves. Donations are important but business loans help people become self sufficient and no longer dependant upon charity. On top of that, once people become successful with their loans they can help other people in their own community.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company find new business opportunities and decide on the best strategies to exploit those opportunities.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I talk to people and get paid for it.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Daniel and Vasudha
lender.loan_because: To contribute to a better world and the eradication of poverty.

lender.name: Jessie
lender.loan_because: A small amount can make a big difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Before i retired, I worked for city government. I planned programs to recycle and reuse things.

lender.name: Blong
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro-lending is an effective tool for fighting poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a micro-enterprise development program that strives to provide technical assistance and loans to refugees and low income entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: They deserve help. God bless them all.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently in school for nursing.

lender.name: Mayday University Hospital Midwives
lender.loan_because: We are a group of Midwives who believe in the empowerment of women in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: We aim to provide a personalised service to women, taking into account their cultural and religious background as well as their expectations and health status. An integrated service is provided with midwives working in both the hospital and the community setting.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: this is a small way to try to close the vast wealth gap in this world. My grandparents and parents were political and war refugees once, and they had to restart their lives with nothing. Some of the pictures on these pages remind me of their situations some 60 years ago.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I have two children. I also manage a team of engineers at a large, multi-national company.

lender.name: Linh
lender.loan_because: It's a good thing.

lender.name: Kraig & Kris Ward
lender.loan_because: We believe in the entrepreneurial spirit and want to support and empower those individuals who are committed to adding value to the lives of others, but don't have the resources to do that without our help.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I teach aspiring entrepreneurs how to leverage their core talents and skills to fill gaps for others (a.k.a. to build virtual "bridges") using the internet.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: My work is based on commerce around the world, so in a way I am helping both me and the person I loan to.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to make the most of their personal finances

lender.name: Jessica Lutz
lender.loan_because:
As I can, how could I not?
KIVA offers me a fantastic way to directly assist persons for whom a little can mean a lot. Still, there is a need for other kinds of support as well (e.g. humanitarian efforts, infrastructure), but this is a fantastic way to help alleviate poverty. And I so admire the entreprenurial spirit! Thank you Kiva for making it possible for me to do my bit in such an easy manner!
Just think about what the world would look like if everybody paid it forward, e.g. via Kiva.

lender.name: Tamerlane
lender.loan_because: I'm fascinated by the whole process, and I would like to make a modest difference to global well-being.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to own my own company and I want to help other entrepreneurs in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am co-owner of a plumbing company.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: Smal entrepenures are the very heart of commerce.
lender.occupational_info: Parent, grandparent, prison chaplain, business man

lender.name: Giovanni
lender.loan_because: I do think microfinance works.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I believe in passing it foward.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student in school and plan to become a teacher.

lender.name: Dutch
lender.loan_because:
I'm very lucky and want to share my luck with others.
"One (person) cannot make another a philosopher, however much learning he may impart, though he may help (them) to become one; for it is only by the exercise of his own reason, by thinking for (oneself), that one becomes a philosopher." -- J. H. Stuckenberg, Life of Immanuel Kant, page 74.
lender.occupational_info: I forecast trends in technology and society. Based on my view of the future, I make bets on the most talented and well-qualified people that will insure a successful tomorrow.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I evaluate children with learning problems and help teachers make learning easier for them.

lender.name: Bridget
lender.loan_because: I am human.
lender.occupational_info: I help attorneys find specific legal documents and prepare for filing in the courts.

lender.name: niddie miyo
lender.occupation: US Navy Seabee, hair stylist, medical fields
lender.loan_because: i care and understand.
lender.occupational_info: i understand the need of money to survive, especially being a single mother to a young child. to give my child the important things in life to survive and be happy is vital to me. so we give to help others.

lender.name: PAM
lender.loan_because: I've been so fortunate in my life and just want to pass on a bit of help to some others in need.

lender.name: Carol & Randie
lender.loan_because: We like Teddy Bears and Gardens.

lender.name: Kayla
lender.loan_because: I love that such a small thing can make a big difference in someone's life

lender.name: daniele
lender.loan_because: perchè no? sono nato fortunato. è ora di distribuire un pò di questa fortuna anche ad altri.... :)
lender.occupational_info: come descrivere ciò che faccio? ho un agenzia di investigazioni commerciali e sono socio di un antiquario con cui vendo su ebay

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: It makes sense.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: accountant.

lender.name: Etienne
lender.loan_because: Having a job is great. Having one's own business is even better. I'm happy if I can help.
lender.occupational_info: I help people when they have questions or problems concerning their employees. The goal is that they have less worries and can focus on making money for the business.

lender.name: Smith Futbol United.
lender.loan_because: I want to help communities develop economically and become peacefully self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large company that allows people to obtain financing to purchase automobiles.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: I am very excited about this. Micro-loans are becoming a big contributor to improving peoples life and thus promoting peace, stability and a more healthy environment. The Internet is obviously a perfect channel for doing this.

lender.name: Nate
lender.loan_because: Jesus said: " I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me." Matthew 25:40

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I feel I can make a meaningful contribution this way.

lender.name: Gary Mc
lender.loan_because: I can. I care. It's fun.

lender.name: Jose
lender.occupation: sales manager for holiday houses in Spain

lender.name: Iba Mar
lender.loan_because: I want to participate in domestic waste management strategy and contibute to the reduction of pollution, protection of human health and the environment
lender.occupational_info: I have setup a collection commercial service for residents in our local communities and involve in the collection, recovery of reusable/recyclable materials, and disposal

lender.name: karen from northern AZ
lender.loan_because: as a social worker I have always been deeply committed to the idea of self-actualization and self-determination.

lender.name: sister kate
lender.loan_because: i loan out because i belive in giving the more you give the more you loan out god will continue providing for me, i want many people on this site to know that if they have any problem am ready to give, my husband his dead and me, my self am sufering from cancer of the breast i have close to $8,000,000 in my bank account but i have no children to inherit the money, thats why i want to used the money to help other people and the orphange.
lender.occupational_info: i am a medical doctor in my country and a par time contractor i eanr nothing less than $100,000 every month.

lender.name: greyfox
lender.loan_because: its just the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: i help build next generation networks for research and education in the united states. at least that's what i think i do.

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: I like the Kiva concept, that I as a private person can help other persons in the world by loaning them money to help improve their business and lives

lender.name: RomyBawa
lender.loan_because: we want to make a difference

lender.name: Captain Scott and Family
lender.loan_because: Teaching my children about giving. I enjoy helping , because I have so much in my life to be thankful for. God Bless the USA
lender.occupational_info: Tugboat Captain who works to many hours.

lender.name: Mingun Bell
lender.loan_because: I want to help others become successful at their business.

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: I am lucky that I can and because it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Nurse,wife and mom

lender.name: Thuy
lender.loan_because: We believe in the micro-loan concept and have a strong desire to help.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: These smiles of hope, are all I need to know that the little that I am doing is going to help them change their own lives.

lender.name: Mario
lender.loan_because: I like the transparency of Kiva. It's nice to know exactly where my money is going and how it is used to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I design systems and create drawings to aid others in manufacturing items.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I want to connect with my sisters throughout the world
lender.occupational_info: I tell stories

lender.name: njangel
lender.loan_because: I think that the Chinese proverb holds true: "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime. " Also, I don't mind helping others who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Kaitlyn
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed to have love and support in my life. I want to return the favor. Thanks, Adrianne + Ali, for a gift that keeps on giving.

lender.name: Karl
lender.loan_because: Quote: Fragrance clings to the hand that gives the rose. Author: Source Unknown
lender.occupational_info: I sell material to build homes

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: We want to help other people achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: We make a difference in the lives of America's at-risk population and single parent households by-way of Recreation Academics Athletics Development (RAAD).

lender.name: wayneandtufi
lender.loan_because: fantastic to see money go directly into the hands of people who can create something real with it, bypassing the middlemen and comission takers...hope to see some projects in Papua New Giuinea - the country of my birth if you get around to it..
lender.occupational_info: fulltime : business development for a large energy company, my focus is developing our biofuels business part time: helping my wife who runs the best dance studio (happy feet dance) in singapore rest of the time: keeping our four legged friend 'tufi' (see picture) entertained

lender.name: Hugh
lender.loan_because: In a small way, I like helping people with their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help individuals and families develop a disiplined and cost effective way to invest for their retirement and children's college.

lender.name: Berndt
lender.loan_because: This feels like a direct and good way to help other people!
lender.occupational_info: My work as a lawyer is also helping people make different legal paperwork, agreements, divorces and so on... I like working with people and it is nice to see how my work helps!

lender.name: Frank & Dee
lender.loan_because: This just seems like a simple way to help make a difference for people. Thanks Kiva.

lender.name: Martini
lender.loan_because: I wish to help.

lender.name: Harry
lender.loan_because: We all need help to get started in life. I did.
lender.occupational_info: I help people solve their personal problems, and also write books and movies.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: ...a Godly example, hard work, and a willing heart make the world a better place.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: we should share what we have with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying biochemistry, but will start studying medicine shortly.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I admire hard-working people who are improving their living conditions for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info:
I help people to appreciate the flow of information, time, and material things in their lives.
www.inquire-within.net

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: " Now, Momma said there's only so much fortune a man really needs... and the rest is just for showing off"

lender.name: Reed
lender.loan_because: I enjoy investing in those who invest in themselves....

lender.name: PJT
lender.loan_because: Value is created by the people we lend to.
lender.occupational_info: Retail, Technology, Non for Profits

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: It's the RIGHT thing to do.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I am very grateful for all that I have.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those who help themselves and work hard.
lender.occupational_info: I connect people with homes for sale & homes for sale with people.

lender.name: victor
lender.loan_because: I want to enhanced pay my school fees and also to press print my new books I wrote since last year.
lender.occupational_info: Am a student!!!

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: My family was always there when I needed money to get ahead in life. What a nice thing to be able to help someone who has no family to rely upon!
lender.occupational_info: I write dessert cookbooks and give cooking lessons.

lender.name: Elaine Torres
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing
lender.occupational_info: I am the manager of a residence that houses Senior Citizens in Fort Lee NJ and near the George Washington Bridge which seperates New Jersey from New York City.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: If i can help somone who really need money to start a business ,i think it is a good cause.

lender.name: sheila
lender.loan_because: I am the owner of a one-person business and enjoy helping other small businesses succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with their health problems in a natural way...through massage and hands-on healing.

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: I hope that it will help increase happiness in the world
lender.occupational_info: 1) Work with data rich digital mapping software; 2) Identify and pursue opportunities to create sustainable solutions for industry, municipalities and resource management

lender.name: Dechen
lender.loan_because: Its a tangible and a fun way to empower others and many of us wouldn't be where we are today without help of others. Buddha's law of interdependence.
lender.occupational_info: a student.

lender.name: grace
lender.loan_because: I am not rich, in fact quite poor yet there is always someone who is worse off than I am. Plus these people are very hardworking and trying to better themselves in life.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: I cannot travel places to help directly, and every day I hear about the troubles people go through just to survive in other parts of the world. I wanted to help in some way, I figured this was the next best thing.

lender.name: ROCKY
lender.loan_because: I love to help people of all walks of life.

lender.name: Debbie & Gary
lender.loan_because: Our lives have been blessed in so many ways. It is important to us to give back in some way.
lender.occupational_info: Gary is a retired math teacher. Debbie is a retired school secretary.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the entrepreneurial spirit and am confident that with dedication, persistence, and a little luck my seed money can help needy individuals succeed in their business endeavors.

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves so that they may improve their lives and those of their families. I especially want to assist women in finding financial independence so they are not subjected to lives of violence - emotional, physical and sexual abuse.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I am a woman, a wife, a mother, a sister.
lender.occupational_info: I help children with their school work.

lender.name: O J
lender.loan_because: I admire those who work hard and who are motivated to help themselves.

lender.name: Curt
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a chance to become self-sufficient. and live an honorable life.
lender.occupational_info: I began as a Minnesota farmboy and retired from large international company where I developed new business in packaging products. I now get great satisfaction from volunteering to help others in many ways. I help fix broken things!

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: We live mostly off the land we work and so we like to help others do the same, but know often they need help getting that first leg up. That is why we prefer to make loans to those in agriculture. It makes me feel connected to the world.

lender.name: Arno
lender.loan_because: I like the idear. Me gusta la idea.
lender.occupational_info: All relationated with tourism. Todo relacionado con turismo

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves is fantastic and Kiva makes it so easy and fun.
lender.occupational_info: Financial accounting for a hospital.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I encourage entrepreneurial endeavors. I am going to run a half-marathon and raise money for a few Kiva micro-loan. That will be my good work to raise the funds for someone else's work.
lender.occupational_info: I teach computer skills in Word, Excel, and internet to people who have been rehabilitated and wanting work skills.

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: I want to help somehow...

lender.name: Mueller Family
lender.loan_because: We want to share our great blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: Learning about the world every day in a hands on manner.

lender.name: Phil & Ann Marie
lender.loan_because: Repaying a loan helps build dignity and pride and helps improve the lives of yourself and your loved ones gives you hope and confidence that things can get better. That said, I make loans because it makes me feel good to be helping others.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I want to help even if it is very little.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It seems to be the best use of my money to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from business, I was in industrial equipment sales (conveyors) and then studied and was ordained into ministry. I served as chaplain at a retirement community for 8 yrs 9 mos.

lender.name: Jim M
lender.loan_because: I support capitalism and the entrepreneurial spirit in the purest sense!

lender.name: Ezra
lender.loan_because: I want to reduce suffering in the world.

lender.name: Raye
lender.loan_because: I've heard so much about micro finance and wished I could get involved, now I can for the small amount I can afford to advance.
lender.occupational_info: I listen to doctor's dictation of medical reports about their patients and then transcribe what they say into text on my computer so others can read it.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: I help employees so they are treated equally.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur too, I want to help, and show God's love in the process.
lender.occupational_info: Looking for good deals in buying shares of businesses, currencies, and real estate.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I loan because it's a smart investment.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Buyer for a company that designs and subcontracts the building of winglets that go on the tips of the wings of Boeing airplanes. Winglets improve the fuel efficiency of certain Boeing passenger planes by creating more lift. I buy parts that make up these winglets.

lender.name: judi
lender.loan_because: it makes the lives of our sisters and brothers across the world just a little better, and if that's not worth doing, what is?
lender.occupational_info: i work in a newspaper office taking care of the mail, phone calls, research, copyediting etc..

lender.name: Edwin Ding 陳 玟成
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in lives.
lender.occupational_info: Please refer to http://www.linkedin.com/in/edwinding

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: Helping out others in need is the basic cornerstone of life. I especially like to loan money to women owned businesses where they are trying to make a better life for themselves and their families. You Go Girls!!!!
lender.occupational_info: I am a recording/audio engineer.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Location Scout and Manager in the entertainment industry finding and supervising locations for commercial, television and film production.

lender.name: Massimo
lender.loan_because: The right thing to do. The opportunity to give something back to the kind and smiling people I met in my travels
lender.occupational_info: a passion for portrait travel photography.

lender.name: LOVEFiLM
lender.occupational_info: We are an online DVD rental company based in the UK, with branches in Germany and Sweden.

lender.name: Mel
lender.loan_because: From little things, big things grow. Small loans can make big differences to individuals, families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children and families who are experiencing significant challenges to their mental health and emotional wellbeing.

lender.name: ian
lender.occupation: a little of this a little of that

lender.name: Ifeanyi
lender.occupation: Worker for Shell Oil Company in Nigeria
lender.loan_because: I am stranded over in Nigeria. My children are located in Virginia and I am not able to get back to the states. The company that I work for is not paying us right now and I have no means of getting back to the United States. Whatever you can do to help me out will be greatly appreciated.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the Shell Oil Company but I am not getting paid at the moment.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It's how I can still help, former Peace Corps and Habitat worker.
lender.occupational_info: Oversee operation of bus systems throughout the southeast part of US

lender.name: Åsa
lender.loan_because: It seems to be a good way to make a difference.

lender.name: Amrita & Raj
lender.loan_because: We believe in making a difference by helping those who seek to better their lives.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I can’t think of a better foreign relations policy than this. Kiva provides a pure and unfettered approach to helping honest people earn an honest living. The ripple effect of these small businesses can be tremendous. I love this concept and intend on expanding my portfolio over time.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: This is the most amazing idea. One of my favorite quotes is "be the change you want to see in the world". There are times when a person just needs a little help and if I can be a small part of someone realizing a goal, what could be better than that? I love the individual aspect of this. Many times when you give to large organizations you have no idea where the money actually goes and if it really goes to the person you want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a voracious reader, an animal activist, and a woman who wants to make a difference in the world. I was a founding member of a canine rescue organization in the United States and care very deeply for the disenfranchised people who share this planet.

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: I live a pretty good life, the least I can do is help others make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I produce all radio and television programming for PossibilitiesMedia, as well as maintain the websites of C2 Church and Possibilities Church.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I must!
lender.occupational_info: Fix the processes we use at the bank to make them better or faster for the customer

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: This is a way to share the opportunities I have been given only by the accident of birth.
lender.occupational_info: I help people upgrade their job skills through educational practices.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Susan & Peter
lender.loan_because: I think most people want help rather than charity. It is great to assist and see the recipient building a business

lender.name: hannh hazel
lender.loan_because: I need 800.00 to set up a discount dollar store here in Antigua

lender.name: Dylan
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Hwee Liang Teo
lender.loan_because: hardworking people deserve a better life. People who want to help themselves deserves to be helped.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a project manager. Projects are 1-time unique endeavors that are unlikely to occur again. My job is to facilitate the successful completion of projects.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed and I believe we are vessels for the blessings to flow through us to others. One small thing can make a great impact.
lender.occupational_info: I transcribe, edit and check the quality of medical records.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.occupational_info: أدرس في جامعة تكساس

lender.name: Fredrik

lender.loan_because: It is fun to help people who are making their lives better!!!
lender.occupational_info: I help companies make the most of the latest in Information Technology.

lender.loan_because: I want to try Kiva out. It sounds like a terrific idea.
lender.occupational_info: I teach in a college and write about lives.

lender.name: Edward

lender.name: james griggs

lender.occupational_info: RETIRED FROM LAW ENFORCEMENT AND CURRENTLY IN AUTO SALES

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me more than I deserve and my heart goes out to people who live with many hardships. Helping other is a way of showing my thanks to God.
lender.occupational_info: I manage my home for my husband and me. I cook, clean, garden, do repairs, pay bills; what ever is needed to care for ourselves and property.

lender.name: Steve
lender.occupational_info: I analyze current trends & events related to scarcity of natural resources, petroleum and water, to determine the most realistic way to a livable future for our children.

lender.name: Manik
lender.loan_because: I care!

lender.name: Lester
lender.loan_because: I believe the Kiva concept will help to make a better world.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: It's exciting to be able to directly support a hard worker in another country whom I would not otherwise have known about.
lender.occupational_info: Before retirement, I worked in my state's center for reporting child abuse and neglect. Now I'm able to volunteer with animal welfare and civil rights groups.

lender.name: Richard W
lender.loan_because: It has a positive impact. It makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I develop software for digital printing systems.

lender.name: CamsMom
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help nurses and other medical professionals learn by designing and programming courses that are taken on the computer.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I like the concept of "pay it forward", and one human being connecting with another.

lender.occupational_info: I am beginning my first year of law school, ultimately to be employed in the legal profession

lender.name: Charlie&Terry
lender.loan_because: God has done for us what we could not do for ourselves

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good that I can do something to help someone help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I "personalize" the inside spaces in peoples homes by installing wallcoverings.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with resources, and I find great joy in sharing them with others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young children about God and God's creation and try to convey a sense of wonder and understanding to them.

lender.name: Kijana
lender.loan_because: Governments charge more than bank. Private giving is win-win.

lender.name: Kelli
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Lilla
lender.loan_because: I believe that we should all have a chance to carry out innovative, entrepreneurial ideas. And I love to support, give and share.

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: Maybe microfinance can help to make the world a fairer place

lender.name: Dary
lender.loan_because: God so loved the world that He gave His one and only Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish but have eternal life.

lender.name: Anali
lender.loan_because: I support Kiva's mission, enabling the common person to make a difference and see the results themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graphic designer who designs magazines, brochures, business logos and many other types of business items.

lender.name: SS Kids Group #1
lender.loan_because: We loan because God wants us to help other people, and also because it feels really great to share!
lender.occupational_info: We're learning about God at St. Clement's Episcopal Church in Berkeley, California.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: it's an elegant way to attack one form of injustice.

lender.name: SS Kids Group #2
lender.loan_because: We loan because God wants us to help other people, and also because it feels really great to share!
lender.occupational_info: We're learning about God at St. Clement's Episcopal Church in Berkeley, California

lender.name: SS Kids Group #3
lender.loan_because: We loan because God wants us to help other people, and also because it feels really great to share!
lender.occupational_info: We're Sunday School students at St. Clement's Episcopal Church in Berkeley, California.

lender.name: Elena
lender.loan_because: I have all the money I need for my family. This is a good way of investing in the future of other families and children in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Spanish literature.

lender.name: Hanne
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance to design their own life, and support when they decide to go for it.

lender.name: Espen
lender.loan_because: I think this is an excellent way to help other people that were not so lucky to be born into the rich part of the world. " Loans that changes lives" says it all...

lender.name: MGU Alumni
lender.loan_because:
MGU Alumni Microfinance is a network of former MGU students wishing to support small entrepreneurs in the former Soviet republics.
We all recieved a big bundle of help and encouragement while living in Moscow and struggling to learn Russian, and we wish to give some of that encourangement back those who are currently struggling to realise their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: MGU Alumni Microfinance is an independent network consisting of former students. It has no official ties to Moskovski Gosudarstvennyi Universitet, the Moscow State University.

lender.name: PAOLO
lender.loan_because: I believe in this kind of help

lender.name: Kopfwerk Germany
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur I know that you need money to start a business, to start to earn money. We have the potential to help, so it is our duty to simply do it.
lender.occupational_info: Kopfwerk is a small creative agency with the wish to help to make this world a better place. Our team of 6 people likes to get involved and wants to change lives. If you like that idea and wiah to contact us, please visit our website.

lender.name: Sam and Marlys
lender.loan_because: we can't afford to give as much as we want, but we DO want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Sam is the lead minister at a church in Cary, NC. Marlys works for a bank, leading a team that takes care of people's retirement accounts.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I can't do a lot....but I can do this.

lender.name: Marcello
lender.loan_because: It's a nice thing. People need help and we give it.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: this is just how the world should work and it gives all of our children a chance.
lender.occupational_info: helping to get resources to where they are needed.

lender.name: Berit
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who need help

lender.name: Manuel & Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: regardless of our cultural differences we all share the same fundamental humanness, struggles and hopes.
lender.occupational_info: I work with hospitals to underake projects and my wife assists persons in dealing with the challenges in their lives.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because:
I believe a loan that helps a person help himself or herself improves the world in a different and perhaps better way than just giving money.
A person who receives a loan, improves his or her business, and then pays it back, can take extra pride in his or her accomplishments. Thus, these loans uplift the human spirit as well as the standard of living.
